newsitem.title: USA: Sioux Falls cattle steady/up $0.50 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Sioux Falls cattle steady/up $0.50 - USDA.

text.p: USDA said slaughter steers and heifers were moderately active, prices were steady to $0.50 higher.
Steers - part load vhoice 3 blacks near 1430 lbs 68.75. High select and choice 2-3 1200-1400 lbs 66.00-68.00. Select and choice 2-3 1100-1300 lbs 64.50-66.00. Select 1-2 62.00-64.50.
Heifers - high select and choice 2-3 1050-1200 lbs 66.00- 67.50. Select and choice 2-3 1000-1125 63.50-66.00. Select 1-2 61.50- 63.50.
